name: Android SMS + Contacts Recovery
short_description:
If you are an owner of Android and you have accidentally deleted all text messages and contacts on the phone, then you will be happy to know that you can easily get them back with the right tool. Jihosoft Android SMS + Contacts Recovery is a simple and powerful tool to help you retrieve lost text messages and contacts on Android without hassle. 

Key Features 
- Recover deleted or lost text messages and contacts from Android with few simple clicks. 
- Compatible with almost all popular Android models from Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony. Motorola, etc. 
- Retrieve lost messages and contacts for various reasons, like deleting, formatting, rooting, factory settings restore, etc. 
- Preview the recoverable text messages and contacts in details before recovery. 

Jihosoft Android SMS + Contacts Recovery can scan Android internal memory and SD card at a faster speed to retrieve lost text messages and contacts.
summary: Retrieve Deleted Text Messages and Contacts on Android
